Generated Narrative: Questionnaire 2.16.840.1.113883.3.249

Last updated: 2024-01-01 00:00:00+0000

Profile: SHINNY Questionnaire Profile

code.display: NYS Accountable Health Communities (AHC) Health-Related Social Needs Screening (HRSN) tool

item.text: What is your living situation today?

valueCoding.display: I have a steady place to live
I have a place to live today, but I am worried about losing it in the future

I do not have a steady place to live (I am temporarily staying with others, in a hotel, in a shelter, living outside on the street, on a beach, in a car, abandoned building, bus or train station, or in a park)

code.display: Problems with place where you live

item.text: Think about the place you live. Do you have problems with any of the following?

valueCoding.display: Pests such as bugs, ants, or mice
Smoke detectors missing or not working

code.display: Has the electric, gas, oil, or water company threatened to shut off services in your home in past 12 months

item.text: In the past 12 months has the electric, gas, oil, or water company threatened to shut off services in your home?

code.display: Within the past 12 months we worried whether our food would run out before we got money to buy more [U.S. FSS]

item.text: Within the past 12 months, you worried that your food would run out before you got money to buy more.

code.display: Within the past 12 months the food we bought just didn't last and we didn't have money to get more [U.S. FSS]

item.text: Within the past 12 months, the food you bought just didn't last and you didn't have money to get more.

code.display: Has lack of transportation kept you from medical appointments, meetings, work, or from getting things needed for daily living

item.text: In the past 12 months, has lack of reliable transportation kept you from medical appointments, meetings, work or from getting things needed for daily living?

code.display: Wants help finding or keeping work or a job

item.text: Do you want help finding or keeping work or a job?

valueCoding.display: I do not need or want help

code.display: Wants help with school or training

item.text: Do you want help with school or training? For example, starting or completing job training or getting a high school diploma, GED or equivalent.
How often does anyone, including family and friends, physically hurt you?

code.display: Insult you or talk down to you [HITS]

item.text: How often does anyone, including family and friends, insult or talk down to you?
How often does anyone, including family and friends, threaten you with harm?
How often does anyone, including family and friends, scream or curse at you?
